data.event: Lincoln County was created in 1809 from parts of Bedford County.

event.title: obtained from the Cherokee and Chickasaw in 1806

data.event: The land occupied by the county was part of a land session obtained from the Cherokee and Chickasaw in 1806.

event.title: the establishment of adjacent Moore County, where it is now

data.event: However, a subsequent redrawing of county lines resulted in the establishment of adjacent Moore County, where it is now located, so no current Lincoln County business uses its namesake process.
